-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Please see the README on GitHub at
--   <a>https://github.com/augustunderground/embrace#readme</a>
@package embrace
@version 0.1.0.0


-- | Internal Utility Functions for AC²E
module ACE.Internal

-- | Convert coerced map from
map' :: Text -> Double -> (String, Float)

-- | Current AC²E version. Linked to
--   <a>https://github.com/electronics-and-drives/ace</a>
version :: String

-- | Get the default MAVEN home path
mvnHome :: IO String

-- | Get the default CLASSPATH to AC²E from local MAVEN install
classPath :: IO String

-- | Java AC²E Base Class
newtype ACEnv
ACEnv :: J ('Class "edlab.eda.ace.AnalogCircuitEnvironment") -> ACEnv

-- | Java AC²E Main Class
newtype SEOEnv
SEOEnv :: J ('Class "edlab.eda.ace.SingleEndedOpampEnvironment") -> SEOEnv

-- | Contruct ACE Object
mkEnv :: String -> String -> String -> IO SEOEnv

-- | Simulate Environment with given sizing parameters
simulate :: SEOEnv -> Map String Float -> IO (Map String Float)

-- | Get available performance parameters
performanceIds :: SEOEnv -> IO [String]

-- | All netlist Parameters
parameters :: SEOEnv -> IO [String]

-- | Sizing Parameters
sizingParameters :: SEOEnv -> IO [String]

-- | Initial Sizing Parameters for given Environment
initialSizing :: SEOEnv -> IO (Map String Float)

-- | Random sizing paramters for given Environment
randomSizing :: SEOEnv -> IO (Map String Float)
instance Language.Java.Unsafe.Coercible ACE.Internal.ACEnv
instance Language.Java.Unsafe.Coercible ACE.Internal.SEOEnv


-- | AC²E Bindings
module ACE

-- | Available Circuits
data CKT

-- | miller opamp with N differential pair
OP1 :: CKT

-- | symmetrical opamp with N differential pair
OP2 :: CKT

-- | (un) symmetrical opamp with N differential pair
OP3 :: CKT

-- | symmetrical opamp with N differential pair and cascodes
OP4 :: CKT

-- | (un) symmetrical opamp with N differential pair and cascode
OP5 :: CKT

-- | miller opamp with N differential pair
OP6 :: CKT

-- | feed-foward opamp
OP7 :: CKT

-- | folded-cascode
OP8 :: CKT

-- | folded-cascode with wide-swing current mirror
OP9 :: CKT

-- | rail-to rail folded-cascode
OP10 :: CKT

-- | rail-to rail folded-cascode with wide-swing current mirror
OP11 :: CKT

-- | Available PDKs
data PDK

-- | X-Fab 350nm Process
XH035 :: PDK

-- | X-Fab 180nm Process
XH018 :: PDK

-- | X-Fab 180nm Process
XT018 :: PDK

-- | SkyWater 130nm Process
SKY130 :: PDK

-- | Cadence Generic PDK 180nm Process
GPDK180 :: PDK

-- | Analog Circuit Characterization Environment
data Env
Env :: [String] -> [String] -> (Map String Float -> IO (Map String Float)) -> Map String Float -> IO (Map String Float) -> Env

-- | List of Available Performance Parameters
[performanceParameters] :: Env -> [String]

-- | List of Available Sizing Parameters
[sizingParameters] :: Env -> [String]

-- | Simulate given sizing
[simulate] :: Env -> Map String Float -> IO (Map String Float)

-- | Initial Sizing
[initSizing] :: Env -> Map String Float

-- | Random Sizing
[randomSizing] :: Env -> IO (Map String Float)

-- | Create a new AC²E
mkEnv :: CKT -> PDK -> IO Env

-- | IO Monad Wrapper for Java Communication
withACE :: IO a -> IO a
instance GHC.Classes.Eq ACE.CKT
instance GHC.Classes.Eq ACE.PDK
instance GHC.Show.Show ACE.PDK
instance GHC.Read.Read ACE.PDK
instance GHC.Show.Show ACE.CKT
instance GHC.Read.Read ACE.CKT
